reviewText: This is the most marvelous series since Anne of Green Gables. I check on a regular basis to see if there is a new one out. I just finished Love's everlasting courage. Every family should start this series and follow it through.
This is a great movie set for the family. It is a good viewing experience to move through the generations with the family.  I hope they keep adding to the story.

Excellent choice for entire family, strong moral Christian principles
Very well filmed and acted , would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a series that can hold the attention and interest of a 44 year old dad, 15 yr old girl, 13 year old boy and two younger girls all loving it!!!! That's a good series

My brother turned me on to these movies.  They are heartwarming and done well!  Everyone in the family can watch these.  The characters are believable and the stories are not contrived.  There is some graphic violence in a few of these DVDs so it may be upsetting for younger kids, but certainly they could watch them.  These were produced my Michael Landon, Jr.  and he has held to his father's high standards.  Great movies with strong heroines!

K I do not have this set but I do own all of the movies (so far) and I love these movies. They really show that relying and trusting in the Lord is what God wants from us. I love Jeannette oke I just need her books now.

I've been trying to buy this set for a while now and this definitely was best bang for buck.  Yeah, 5 DVDs are crammed into one case, but nice done so they don't slide and are staggered so they don't clump together.  I finally have my set without paying an arm/leg.  Now I have to get all of her other books....love Janette Oke..
This is awesome series. I have loved the books. Tried to catch the movies on Hallmark, but never catch ALL of them. So when I saw the series and the awesome price, I couldn't help myself.
I enjoyed the series.

Saw the first one on TBN and immediately bought the whole series for the family.  Great story line with positive message in a "Little House on the Prairie" setting.  When the first set came, two DVD's had NO LABELS on them.  So I "exchanged" them with no problem.  But the replacement came with missing labels on the same two DVD's.  So I returned both of them together, and left a description on the return part of the website to please contact me when the quality issue is resolved.  There's no way to find a phone number to call anybody at Amazon, so I hope someone there reads either this comment or the comment on returns, because I really do what a set, and to buy more as gifts.  I just want labels on all the DVD's :-)
Love it

These movies are so good.  The reason I gave this a 4 star instead of a 5 star is because 2 of the plastic CD's did not come with screen art.  Those 2 CD's looks like homemade CD's. I was not happy with that but the movies are very good.  Get out the tissue because some are tearjerkers.

Each movie is very well done, engaging, easy to follow the story line, and well-written and acted.  Some of the outdoor scenery is breathtaking.  Well-balanced on triumphs and tragedies, a good depiction of the simpler life from not that long ago with all the same human conflicts of today's life.

Now that I've watched each movie in the set, I want more, they are that good.  I found that I love to sit and watch these good, clean family-friendly movies which include having faith in God while not preaching about it, just presenting it as a part of life as it once was, and still is for many of us.

This is a good, clean movie based on the first book in a series by Janette Oke.  It is the story of a couple who are on their way west by wagon to claim and homestead land.  When the husband is accidentally killed, the wife is left with a life-changing decision that will forever alter her future.  This is good movie for all ages.  I highly recommend the series of books as well.

One of the best family friendly series that I have viewed in a long time.  Really worth the purchase price.

This is a wonderful full set collection of the entire Love Comes Softly Series! It's very well packaged in two - 5 Disc Flat Paks which only take up the storage space of 2 DVDs. All of the Discs have Captions for Hearing and Language and are visually crisp and clear with excellent audio. There are no shortcuts in this beautiful collection!
I love these stories and had collected most of them one by one as they became available at much higher cost per than the price of this Set! I had given them to a young family and I was missing them so this 10th Anniversay edition is a perfect replacement for myself. The addition of the 2 Pre-quils is a nice bonus. The actor who plays the young Clark is excellent as is Dale Midkiff in the original episodes. IMHO Dale Midkiff carries the continuity of the series very well with gentleness, wisdom and strength. His character portrayal very well represents the tenderness and unconditional love of our Heavenly Father God!
These movies are wonderful for all ages on many levels. They're heartwarming and educational for children in depicting without frightening, just how tough life was for pioneers. Both men and the women had to endure, survive and succeed every aspect of building, rebuilding and blending families and homes. Seeing the labor involved in just getting a drink of water - which most of us now take for granted comes from the faucet, (or is purchased in designer bottles) is a point of interest and learning - as in the monumental daily tasks of feeding, clothing and educating thier young with the constant threats of sickness and death from so many factors. It's good for children today to have a glimpse of what our predecessors went thru to expand this great Nation of ours.
Our Secular Society doesn't want it taught in our American History how vital personal Faith in God was to the endurance and success of our people. That's what gave them the ability to succeed and that's what is needed even more desperately now than ever.... These stories gently display these historical elements and still make the connection that even though our culture and technologies have changed drastically on the human level we are still the same. We need each other -our family and our friends.  And we still need the comfort, guidance and forgiveness of Almighty God as found in His unchaging Word - The Holy Bible.

I had just finished the first season of When Calls The Heart and am waiting for the 2 season to come out in a dvd set. While waiting, I decided to watch this series and at first I was a bit anxious because you can def tell that it was filmed a while back. Loved how I could recognize a lot of actors who made it big today.

I actually really liked this series. Not as much as When Calls the Heart, but it is a very good, uplifting series that I first began to watch alone but then I got my mom into it so we began watching one disk every night with tea. We laugh, we cry, and we get our hearts touched. It did bother me that one of the characters had their actor changed. Stuff like that always bothers me. I also didn't like this one actress who looked too young and her acting skills were eh. Oh and the fact that she chased the boy annoyed me a bit. Other than that, love this series.

Overall I think these videos are well done.  I would give them four stars except for one thing.  I wanted to buy romantic movies for me and my wife to watch together.  *** Spoiler Alert *** But in almost all of these movies, there is a husband who dies (sometime two of them, sometimes just a father figure).  My wife says I should not worry about that because I am her second husband, and the first husband is the one who usually dies.  But it just doesn't seem romantic to me to have the husband(s) die so often.  Maybe I'm just old-fashioned.  Or maybe I'm just old and worry too much about kicking the bucket.  These movies sure don't help my anxiety problems.  LOL.

LOVE COMES SOFTLY is an excellent set of books and an excellent series of ten movies.

BUT ... don't think that you need to pay a premium charge. This same collection is available from Amazon for under $10, less than a dollar per movie.

This is a wonderful series of movies, based  on an excellent set of books. It gives us a chance to see what life was like in the 19th century, not only on the prairies. Life is full of ups and downs, surprises and much more.

But be sure you get the best deal that you can. In fact, I have no idea why there are two listings for this identical package.

I highly recommend this set of movies, but be sure you pay the lower price.

Over the next few days, I will be watching all 10 of these movies, and I will update this review after each one.

LOVE COMES SOFTLY

I just got done watching the first movie in this 10th Anniversary Collection, and it is everything that the other five star reviewers tell you that it is.

This movie, based on Janette Oke's book, is excellent. It lets us see a relationship grow between a widow, a widower, and his daughter. We see mistakes they make along the way, but we also get to laugh with them, cry at injustice, and ask, "God, why do you let bad things happen to good people?"

Misunderstandings happen, confusion reigns, but things do work out in the end. At the beginning, it is a marriage of convenience, with a daughter who does not want another mother. She must learn to grieve before she can go on with her life.

Love does come softly, but we could also say that love comes slowly, but all three of our characters do grow to love each other with their whole hearts.

I highly recommend this movie.

LOVE'S ENDURING PROMISE

I bought this set for my wife.  Neither of us has read the books so we watched the movies with no preconceptions, except that we knew them to be by a Christian author.

If you're looking for wholesome movies then these fill that criterion.  But there's nothing else to them.  The set containing the first 6 books would be better because after that the stories deteriorate and become increasingly sentimental.  By the time we'd reached the final movie I was getting annoyed because there was just nothing there except an attempt to wring out emotion, but it was so poorly done.  The last movie was so tedious that neither my wife nor I will even watch the earlier ones ever again.

And the stories are effectively the same story but with different characters - they're obviously written to a formula.  As I said, wholesome but increasingly tedious and monotonous.  Its great that we're starting to see wholesome movies but judging by these, there is still a way to go.

And they're definitely not for guys.  I watched them with my wife because she says she enjoys them more when I watch them with her.  I was OK for the first three but after that it was brutal.

A history of a family in the West with love, tears, death and strength to go forward and improve themselves. Love and respect and hope regardless of the troubles coming from nature, people and health. I adore it.
This is an excellent series of movies and we love it They show the power of family and faith as well as the resilience of people in early America.
My family loved these.. Excellent Christian values. Very well written and great actors. Would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants to go back in time and experience the way life used to be.
I love watching old movies like these especially western movies. Very relaxing and I love these movies. Must have!! Great movies.
We are really enjoying this series with our entire family.  It is inspirational and is ok for my 8 year old and my 16 year old.  It is a spiritually uplifting story! We really recommend it!

When I order films, I usually order films of an "escape" nature from reality. I didn't like the main character dying. I would have preferred that they lived "happily ever after". I've seen "Love Begins" about 50 times....I actually bought the DVD!

This is one of the best family DVD sets that I have watched in a very long time!  It is great for the entire family to watch.  I have seen the first eight movies and I am now purchasing the next three in the series.  I'm sure they will satisfy my love for great christian family value movies.  Thanks to Janette Oke for writing these beautiful novels.  I am so glad they decided to make movies out of them!  I wish they would make some movies from other great Christian Fiction writers such as Karen Kingsbury, Robin Lee Hatcher and Beverly Lewis' series.

Love the movie series!  Shipped promptly.  The last DVD skipped and paused alot while playing and a few of the DVD's didn't have a label which was frustrating but thankfully can still enjoy the majority of it.  A movie series I watch at least a couple times a year - love it in my collection.
This series is great for the whole family and the price was right compared to other vendors on Amazon.  Delivery was quick.  We love this series and will watch it for years to come.
I love this collection.  I spent my weekend seeing the movies.  I plan movie night with my daughters and they love it too
I got it as a gift for a family member. They said that they loved it very much. They saw the whole thing in 2 days.
Love this series of movies - watching it with my 9 year old granddaughter and loving every minute!!  I recommend these.

Absolutely love it. I had a lump in my throat through most of it. I even caught my tough guy husband with a tear in his eye. We watched them together and we both thoroughly enjoyed the series. Great to watch movies that are inspiring and heartwarming with no violence, bad language or sex. Michael Landon Jr. sure learned a lot from his father. Now I can't wait to read the books.

This is a set of all 10 of the Love Come Softly movies based on the books by Janette Oke. I have loved them since I watched them on Hallmark. These are wholesome family movies about love, tragedy and how God will see you through anything. The movies span generations of the Davis family. The movies are: Love Comes Softly, Love's Enduring Promise, Love's Long Journey, Love's Abiding Joy, Love's Unending Legacy, Love's Unfolding Dream, Love Takes Wing, Love Finds a Home, Love Begins and Love's Everlasting Courage. The movies were brand new and factory sealed. I bought them at a very reasonable price (I looked around and this was the best price I could find) and received them very quickly. I'm very pleased with them and look forward to sharing them with the rest of my family! Thanks!!
Excellent family entertainment including young children. Excellent portrayal of family values. We were please to find movies we could show our grand children.
These movies are sooooo awesome!!!  Especially if you are a fan of movies like the little house on the prarie.  They are great for family- no violence-no language-christian inspired.
Product arrived super fast and in perfect condition.  This is a wonderful collection to have in your collection of movies, heartwarming family entertainment at its finest.

I did like the books better because the story line was kept throughout.  There were a number of areas where the screenwriters changed the story completely and I preferred the Book version.  After saying that the movies version is very delightful and I recommend it for anyone considering the purchase.
I have followed parts of Love comes softy for years, to watch a movies from beginning to end without the kind of violence on movie scenes today is so calming, totally enjoyable. thank you

Love the characters and can hardly wait to watch one movie to the next....have 3 to go.  Absolutely love the story lines (even though they are somewhat predicatable).  There's nothing like a good sappy movie and CLEAN entertainment!
Always a favorite of mine. I call it a story of the power of love. True love can change everything

I just received it a couple days ago and have just now been able to watch each DVD.  the stories are wonderful but the DVDs have problems.  There are two different DVD's that have a problem playing.  One of them will not move forward, from the very beginning and another one stops in the middle of the DVD and won't continue....I even cleaned my DVD player because of course we always blame our self first but, every other DVD plays fine in it so, there are TWO defective discs.
Item arrived ahead of schedule and I am very pleased with the arrival and now I have the complete set, it was worth it
Love this collection, totally worth the price compared to other stores and websites, the product was in great shape and I didn't have trouble with any of the DVDS.
I not big on the church sence but this movie not about the church but about family and learning a lesson in love...

Love comes Softly 10 anniversary collection is a great collection for those who love Western Movies or The Simple life just living in the country. All movies are christian movies that will take you on a heartwarming journey full of adventure, courage, love and faith.
Got this as a gift for my wife, she's loved reading the books, and the whole family enjoys watching the movies, they're great!

These movies show God at work in all that they did , just the way our founding fathers also did many years ago. It will touch your heart to see the love for your fellow man and God, something you don't see much of today.
These movies have a message of love and hope just watched every one of these and have the ture meaning of love and respect for each other.  Good Christian movies.
It was worth the price. All 10 of the shows from the series for less than $50 was worth it.

Wonderful entertainment! The young people that I have shared these DVD's with, love them too! They have good morals and are still entertaining. I wish there were more stories like these on TV these days!

My neighbor and I are having "girl's movie night" to fill the cold winter evenings while her husband is at work.  This set is just what I was looking for and at a good price too.  I saw these dvd's at a local store for much more.  These are a "Good Old Love Story"
This set comes with 10 discs. All of the Love Comes Softly movies are included in this set. Great buy. Would definately recommend to anyone who loves the books or movies.

These DVDs, based on Janette Oke's series, "Love Comes Softly" are popular because of the characters and storyline. Beginning with a young couple moving west by covered wagon, you are immediately transported to the time and place and love these characters immediately!
Bought the set for my fathers birthday. Right after his birthday mother fell and is in a nursing home. The dvd's have been a great companion during some lonely days.

I really have enjoyed this whole series. I am also a Little House fan, and these movies will remind you of that series as well. They are wholesome entertainment for the entire family. With all of the junk being produced in the film industry today, it is wonderful to find clean and decent movies like these to share with the family.
Love this series of movies. Good love stories with values and no inappropriate content. Family friendly.
Good program! Bring back more of these!
This is another wonderful collection of the Love Comes Softly series of movies. Good family entertainment!
Terrific series.
we love this series

My wife and I are currently working our way through this series of "chick flicks" which aren't only for chicks. Good, solid stories of the way things used to be before God got kicked out of American/Canadian society and culture.
Great product
Love this series. The characters seem real. Great meanings. Great and inspiring.
love this series  I saw one episode and had to own this .

A pleasant trip to the world of long ago in the American West!
Good story lines filled with values and the kind of communities that existed at the time.
Sorry the series ended!!!
